argument.description: A Boolean value that specifies whether to return NULL if the input JSON string is invalid instead of returning an error. To return NULL if the JSON is invalid, specify true (t). To return an error if the JSON is invalid, specify false (f). The default is false.

description: JSON_ARRAY_LENGTH returns the number of elements in the outer array of a JSON string. If the null_if_invalid argument is set to true and the JSON string is invalid, the function returns NULL instead of returning an error.
